segments.text: I notice that woman completely lost in her task, drying plates while chaos builds around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It amazes me how someone can be so diligent and yet so unaware of the world collapsing around them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already in that puddle, but there's not even a flicker of concern on her face.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Watching the children is like a scene from a play where the audience knows the disaster is coming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy, balancing on that rickety stool, just looks so proud of himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His determination is admirable, yet I want to yell at him to get down before he falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl’s eager pose makes me chuckle; she’s clearly in on the cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think about how easily accidents can happen in a moment like this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sunlight streaming in through the window contrasts with the mess inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s as if the outside world is reminding me that everything should be calm and organized.
segments.speaker: PAR
